name: Tape #42 - CUBE
description:
i found this weird vhs tape lying around,
i wonder what it's about

your time is of the essence

-----------------------------------

press green flag to restart
arrow keys to move

-----------------------------------

For WINDOWS users: download the zip file. open it, find and run CUBE.exe
For MAC users: download the zip file. open it, and run CUBE.app

If you cannot open these files, here's help:
MAC: Mac App Not Starting? Here’s How to Fix It . 
WINDOWS: When you get a popup along the lines of: Windows protected your PC, press more info and then press run anyway
